tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote h2 span
content: Active Adults Want Homes They've Always Dreamed About

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p i span
content: By Kendall Carre

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Merchandising for an �active adult� community starts with identifying today's active seniors. Today�s 55-year-olds are a different breed than their counterparts of only a decade ago, and that means this market segment must be redefined.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: For example, older adults will be retiring later, often for financial reasons but also for pure enjoyment.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: When attempting to define today�s �active adults,� there is one thing for certain: They are active. They eat healthier, exercise regularly, spend more time on hobbies and are living longer.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Their vision of a new home is closer to their dream home than anything they�ve previously owned, right down to the interior design.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: �The interior merchandising for these homes should create a personal focus revolving around the individuals who will be living here,� says Debra Newell, founder and president of Tustin, CA-based

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p a span
content: Ambrosia Interior Design, Inc.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote h4 span
content: Sponsored by:

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote h4 a span
content: Countrywide Home Loans

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote a span
content: Find out how our forward commitments program can lock in rates for extended periods.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote a span
content: See how you can get a loan with as little as no down payment through Countrywide�s Zero Down Plus Program.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: A good example comes from the 14 new model homes at Pulte/

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p a span
content: Del Webb

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: 's

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p a span
content: Sun City Lincoln Hills

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: in Lincoln, CA, which Ambrosia is merchandising.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Ranging from just under 1,200 to more than 3,000 square feet, these homes are designed to appeal to boomers � in both architecture and merchandising. The homes are larger, with bigger kitchens and more space for entertaining. There is enough room for example, for a large dining table for family gatherings and there are special places for hobbies, home offices, exercise and relaxation.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p strong span
content: Fill the Home With Their Favorite Things

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: A home�s personalization is key to its appeal to active adults, Newell points out.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: �Buyers are looking at this home as the one they can finally do their way,� he says. �They want everything to be the nicest they�ve ever owned.�

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Most buyers have owned and decorated several homes over the years. They�ve learned from their mistakes and want to fill this home with their favorite things.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: �If the buyer�s passion is cooking, they will spend a large amount of their option dollars on things like granite or Cesarstone countertops, and glazed cabinets with glass doors.� adds Newell.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Buyers at Sun City Lincoln Hills are spending $50,000-$60,000 for architectural upgrades and options such as flooring and countertops.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p strong span
content: Low Maintenance Is Another Hot Button

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Although active adult home buyers desire the best in everything, they do not want a home that requires plenty of upkeep. Low maintenance and high quality are the hot buttons for these buyers, and creating a balance between the two is essential.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Newell says that the interiors of active adult homes should be lighter and brighter than what is found in a typical single-family home.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: �We see 35% less light as we get older, so the rooms are painted in warmer, lighter colors and awash in at least three light sources,� he says.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: At Ambrosia, designers use this lightness as a backdrop for accesories and fabrics that add color and texture throughout the home.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: As in the single-family home market, active adult homes are becoming more themed.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p strong span
content: Not Every Buyer Wants to Vacation at Home � But Most Do

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: �Since this is their dream home,� says Newell, �most of these buyers want it to have the relaxed feel of a vacation retreat.�

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Ambrosia often incorporates the design and color palates associated with plantation, seaside cottage or Tommy Bahamas interiors to satisfy this desire.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: �Of course, we still design models that include traditional, classic and more eclectic interiors, but the vacation feel is very hot right now," Newell says. �We don�t want to get so caught up (in what's hot) that we don't reach the buyer who desires a home with the builder�s more standard amenities.�

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: For the active adult buyers who would rather spend their money on an actual vacation than a �vacation-feel� home, "we work with the builder to show everything he includes as standard, adding special touches to make the home just as enticing,� Newell says.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p span
content: Whether merchandising to include the ultimate in what the active adult buyer desires or what they can realistically afford, understanding that the active adult is an individual who continues to participate in the excitement and rigors of everyday life is essential.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p em span
content: Kendall Carre is the marketing director of Tustin, CA-based

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p em a span
content: Ambrosia Interior Design, Inc.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td blockquote p em span
